channel.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
channel.description: For me, Mark IV is better because you can put more ammunition to this suit than Mark V. Its jump is also seems to be higher and also doesn't mix the power of the suit with flashlight, oxygen, sprint or any things that require the suits power.

item.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
item.dc:creator: imadoofus
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Video games anger me enough on their own

In 3-6 days, you will be recieving a package containing all of my yes. Use it wisely.

Read full topic
item.source: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?

item.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Yeah. I don’t know about the rest of you but if I pay 50+ bucks for a game I’d feel much better about that investment if the item I bought lets me squeeze a little comfort out of it. Video games anger me enough on their own

Read full topic
item.source: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?

item.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Dias:

I’m well aware of that. I’d just like to understand why anyone would “feel better that they’re there”. I can kinda understand hud color options, because it’s can be done with the change of a few small numbers & could possibly benefit players with different types of color blindness. I’d just like to understand why some people feel the need to customize virtually everything.

Some people prefer a female voice over a male voice. Some people prefer a specific kind of crosshair, while others like something else. Choices are put there, someone will make one, and they’ll enjoy it.

Read full topic
item.source: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?

item.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
xalener:

Crysis 1 has shitloads of choices that didn’t mean shit, but makes one feel better that they’re there."

Really? When I see choices like that I don’t “feel better” I just end up wishing the harddrive space & time spent making that content was put towards something I could actually give a shit about.

item.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Crysis 1 has shitloads of choices that didn’t mean shit, but makes one feel better that they’re there. That’s kinda one of it’s defining features.

That being said, I’d have taken C1’s male voice over C2’s forced default anyway. Idc if it was supposed to be prophet the whole time, his accent is fucking distracting.

“brek da pyadlawk”

Read full topic

item.source: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?

item.title: Which Suit is better - Mark IV or Mark V?
item.dc:creator: imadoofus
item.description:
Guys. Guys. Guysguysguys. I just read that the Mark VI is coming out and it has a TON of optional and removable features, including:

  • Multi-Outlet Recharge Adapter
  • Six voice options
  • Removable boot platforms
  • Built-in three-months-free XM Radio
  • Pop-up reflex Helmetless Scope™
  • Eighteen different color options

And that’s just a taste! The thing’s the Lamborghini of radiation suits! But with removable boot platforms.

Read full topic
